chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:

There are several things that have come up during the test, but the fundamental one is that it won't let me link the card to apple pay wallet. The message "verification not available. Try again in a few minutes" pops up.

Thank you,

The customer confirms that the device has not been opened or repaired by a third party, exposed to water or suffered damage from impact or fall.

Hello Ixone: You will find the return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Please choose a location that is comfortable for you to send back your package. You can find a list of delivery points here: https://www.seur.com/en/busqueda-tiendas.do Preparation of your return: 1. Consult the instructions on how to return a product here 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your article 3. Remove any protective cover or screen protector that it has 4. Package your article and its accessories following the tips below Packaging of the article: • The box must be strong and resistant. You should place your article inside the box safely so it doesn't move during transit. • Stick the return label on top of the box (you can also add a supplementary label inside to help identify your shipment in case the original label peels off or gets damaged). • Take photos of the interior and exterior of your package before sending it. This will protect you in case your article gets damaged during transport. Your return is ready for shipping! We'll let you know when it arrives. Best regards, Back Market Customer Service, Back Market Customer Service

Juan from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile

I will be aware of your response, remember that the seller needs the device as soon as possible.

Thank you very much for your help, I will be attentive to your answer.

Dear Backcare,

The device seems to be locked with a code. Could you assist the customer in unlocking the device?

Regards,

Hi ecomobile,

Hi there, here Juan again, I hope you're fine!

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Please provide a solution to the customer within the next (1) business day, or unfortunately we’ll have to refund the order, according to the Back Market Quality Charter.

We can not provide you with a password because this is not possible. When you receive the phone, please do a complete restore and verify. If the phone is good and doesn't have any issues, please proceed with the replacement

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Juan Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
KW
